name: clrmamepro
description:
ClrMamePro is a ROM-manager. It will help you keep your ROM collection up-to-date and organized through the use of DAT files.

ClrMamePro Features finding missing games, roms, samples find and rename wrong named roms, samples find and resize wrong sized roms find wrong checksums (bad dumps, etc.) find and remove unneeded files merge and unmerge roms.
